TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, it's 2024 and it's not up on Steam yet. You panic realizing it's not yet in Steam meaning it's delayed, again.

I wish for a new PC to play KSP2

Hey! I hear some knocking! It's page 723! Let him in!

Granted, that PC is for preview only, not for long personal purpose!

I wish that every user in this forum would be active.

Granted. They all just post spam.

I wish to know what happens when you install a mod without the dependences without having to do it myself.

(@AtomicTech)

Goodnight!

Granted: No dependencies, then no work. It is why they are called Dependencies.

I wish that had been in that other thread.

Granted, this thread as it's still "that other thread".

I wish to succeed on my English debate

Granted, you speak ancient English. And while you succeed in that pursuit, no one understands a thing you say.

I wish, nay, demand more coffee!

Granted.  You simply need to plant, cultivate, harvest, roast, and grind the beans first.

I wish I was asleep.
I wish I had a bigmac

33 minutes ago, Scarecrow71 said:

I wish I was asleep.

Granted, we... coverted you into a Dead Scarecrow. No need to think of sleeping time!

5 minutes ago, SpaceFace545 said:

I wish I had a bigmac

Granted, wait... we're out of BigMacs... Sorry, but you can still try out our brand new Whopper! Our costumers say that it's very delicious!

...

God damnit, this stupid burger... *trows away the Whopper*

*sigh* we don't have customers after that new burger, at least they're paying me a lot.

Locally granted.  I have added your memes to the adBlock list, so you can't use them here.

22 minutes ago, SpaceFace545 said:

I wish I had a bigmac

Granted. Your current computer is replaced with a Big Mac, Apple Macintosh II from 1980s.

***

I wish PC had a ZX Spectrum keyboard with up to 7 functions per key.

Edited February 10, 2022 by kerbiloid

Granted. However, each and every function only results in the number 7 being typed.

I wish to get all 7's on a scratch-ticket.

Granted: You get all 7s on a find the word scratchie.

I wish for Wookies in Star Trek.

Granted. See those brown spots on the rumpled front hull.

I wish the time machine did not require daily recharge.

Hourly recharge, not daily recharge. Happy?

I wish to wake up

Then why are you waking down? Turn around.

I wish for a Wishzilla.

Granted: It appears and then destroys Tokyo.

I wish that you hadn't unleashed it on the world.

Granted, kerbiloid doesn't exist. It turns out that they will save the world someday.

I wish KSP development hadn't stopped.

They didn't stop. They made more features, but at the same time, more bugs and extra Kraken doses.

I wish to just finish my interstellar base

Granted. It's somewhere between the stars, and nobody (including you) can't find it.

I wish the mentioned Tokyo had at least week to have a rest between the giant monster invasions.

Granted: The monsters move on to your home town.

I wish I could astral project.

Granted. You start a project of astral travels.

I wish, they join you.

Granted, they join you instead for no reason 

I wish, they join no strangers

Granted: Once you join you are no longer strangers.

I wish to hear good songs.

Granted. You hear the Rigelian Invasion Fleet March from the sky,

I wish the modern games were as interactive as DukeNukem 3d was.

Granted: You find the old level I once created, decades a go, where Duke fights on the Star Ship Enterprise while it is attacking a Klingon warship, and somehow it works in KSP.

I wish it wasn't lost in the past somewhere.
